title: Nadu Kadalula Lyrics Vaaliba Raja Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song : Nadu Kadalula
Singer(s): Radhan, Gana Bala
Movie: Vaaliba Raja
Music:Â Radhan
Lyrics: Gaana Bala

Nadu kadalula Kappala erangi
thalla mudiyumey ennaala thalla mudiyumey
aana thalla mudiyala
yenna kappal illaye.

kolaveriyala tunela piduchi
paadamumey ennaala paadamudiyumey
aana paadamudiyala
yenna endhuillaye!!
tune-u enadhuillaye

Ye thoondila potta
adhula maattidum meenu
adha salt-a pottu kaaya vacha
what a karuvadu
what a karuvad
what a karuvad
what a karuvad

Ding-u dong-u bellu
en ammu kutti nillu
indha tea kudicha bill-u
naa prey pannuven
unakku prey pannuven

Kaasu panam thuttu money money
vandhu pogudhu cabula many many

Oodha kalaru ribbon katti vandhaley
kitta otti ninnaley
ayyo oththa sollaaley.
kala kala kalasalaanu
kalatti vittaaley
stepiniya kalatti vittaaley.

Soi soi nee sothapify
all your beauty
naan seiyyren oti
Solilitaaley ava kaadhala

Nadu kadalula Kappala erangi
thalla mudiyumey ennaala thalla mudiyumey
aana thalla mudiyala
yenna kappal illaye.

Thatchanaya koduthuputta
sothu kaiyyale
madakkuna piece-a kaiyyaale
adhu oththa kada oththa kada
oththa kada maama

Indha ponnungale ippadithaan
purinji pochuda
sathiyama enakku ava
thevayillada
ada sathiyama enakku ava
thevayillada

Oorula neethaandi osthi ponna
adhukku ora kannaa
Marriage galiege-nu gaja sonnan
machaan gaja sonnan.

Venam macha venaam indha
ponnunga kadhalu
indha ponnunga kadhalu
adhula varudhu modhalu

Azhagu raani pon
unakku enmela kan
naan vaangi thaaren bun
ne innaavenaa pan.
Kannaa laddu thinna aasayaa.

Nadu kadalula Kappala erangi
thalla mudiyumey ennaala thalla mudiyumey
aana thalla mudiyala
yenna kappal illaye.

kolaveriyala tunela piduchi
paadamumey ennaala paadamudiyumey
aana paadamudiyala
yenna endhuillaye!!
tune-u enadhuillaye

Ye thoondila potta
adhula maattidum meenu
adha salt-a pottu kaaya vacha
what a karuvadu
what a karuvad
what a karuvad
vaangannaa vanakkangannaa !!!!
